column4: <willluongo> make sure your dns is set up correctly and then your ubuntu server can ping them
The server can access the internet, the problem is the routing for the LAN

kubuntu desktop, DHCP handled by a seperate device pointed to gateway at the IP 192.168.1.1 which is also the same as the router I am replacing (which workeD) the only thing the clients can ping is LAN hosts
